participant_1.background:
I like cooking homemade meals to balance out my fast food eating habit.
i still live at home.
i went to japan this summer.
i hope to retire to florida.
I love to make tasty carrot soup in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
i am in a rock band.
I ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love.
I love to watch mystery movies when I'm not baking.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Just reading a book and drinking my coffee. What about you?
I am making carrot soup and doing some work.
That sounds delicious! I love carrot soup.
Thanks! I like to cook homemade meals to balance out my fast food eating habit.
That's smart. I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I like to read too, but I don't always have the time. What are you reading right now?
I'm reading "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. It's a classic that I've been meaning to read for a long time.
That's a great book! I read it a few years ago and really enjoyed it.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm about halfway through and I'm really enjoying it.
I hope you finish it! It's a really good book.
Thanks! I'm planning on finishing it soon.
